channel.title: [PI] Checkbank Command Edit

item.title: [PI] Checkbank Command Edit
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Hello, I was wondering if someone could edit this command so that it works for users with spaces in their names. Its a fine command but sometimes we need to check peopleâ€™s banks with spaces and it gets annoying. Thanks for your time! if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } }

Read full topic
